Theme or setting:Oldschool Comic

„Was ist denn hier passiert?“

OH NEIN!

Heiliger Strohsack – Der Sheriff von Heureka wurde ermordet!?

Da nun niemand mehr für Recht und Ordnung sorgt, fallen die Bösewichte in Scharen ein, um den wehrlosen Dörflern das Leben zur wahrgewordenen Hölle zu machen! Ist das das traurige Ende des einst so friedvollen Dorfes namens Heureka?

ABER SOWAS VON NICHT!

In Townsfolk Tussle spielt ihr eine Gruppe bunt gemischter Dörfler, die das Gesetz in die eigene Hand nehmen, um diesen tunichtguten Bösewichten ordentlich den Hosenboden aufzureißen. Und wer weiß, vielleicht erweist sich dabei ja doch noch einer von euch als würdig, die freigewordene Stelle des Sheriffs mit neuem Leben zu füllen! Habt ihr das Zeug dazu, das kleine Dörfchen Heureka vor dem sicheren Untergang zu bewahren? Wir setzen auf euch!

Townsfolk Tussle ist ein „Boss Battler“. Was bedeutet eigentlich Boss Battler, habt ihr euch sicher gerade gefragt? In einem Boss Battler tretet ihr gegen einen Feind an, der über ein Kartendeck gesteuert wird. Dabei müsst ihr keine aufwändigen Regeln lernen, sondern euch nur an ein kleines Gerüst halten. Der ganze Rest? Na der steht einfach auf der Karte drauf, die ihr jede Runde zieht! Und was heisst das für euch? Doppelt so viel Spaß! Denn nicht nur verhält sich durch das einzigartige Kartendeck jeder „Boss“ ganz anders (und mit jeder Partie erfahrt ihr mehr, über sein „Verhalten“) – ihr könnt euch ganz auf eure Helden konzentrieren, ohne viele komplizierte Regeln zu lernen!

Und wie läuft das hier bei Townsfolk Tussle? Einfach! Mit einer Gruppe von bis zu 5 Dörflern (das sind eure Helden) tretet ihr gegen bis zu 12 unterschiedliche Bösewichte an. Nutzt dabei die asymmetrischen Fähigkeiten eurer Dörfler, abgefahrene Waffen und viele andere verrückte Ausrüstungsgegenstände, um den Bösewichten möglichst schön den Garaus zu machen. Besonders gut ist es natürlich, wenn ihr dabei noch die ein oder andere Heldentat vollbringt, denn wer weiß, vielleicht hat einer von euch ja doch noch das Zeug zum neuen Sheriff!

Doch Achtung: Kaum ist ein Bösewicht besiegt, taucht auch schon der nächste auf. Dazwischen ist gerade mal genug Zeit, um im Dorf auf eine kleine Einkaufstour für neue Ausrüstung zu gehen.

Der Reihe nach müsst ihr 4* verschiedene Bösewichte besiegen, jeder davon härter als der davor. Erst wenn am Ende in einem furiosen Finale der Endgegner besiegt ist, kann die Bevölkerung von Heureka wieder in Ruhe schlafen.
*Hey, oder auch nur 3, wenn ihr die kurze Variante bevorzugt.

Das Grundspiel (die deutsche Version der englischen 2. Auflage) gibt euch die Wahl aus 7 Dörflern, um euch den insgesamt 12 Bösewichten zu stellen. 256 Ausrüstungsgegenstände, 100 Dorf-Ereignisse und 75 Heldentaten sorgen dafür, dass es dabei nie langweilig wird.

Trekking Are you ready to enjoy an incredible day in the mountains without leaving your home? In Trekking, you can go on a great nature hike and observe the wildlife that inhabits the mountains while climbing the best peaks. You will need to wisely manage your energy to avoid collapsing in the mountains, but don't worry, because along the way you can stop at various shelters, rest for the next stage, and make new friends over coffee.

TCG Factory invites you to enjoy a pleasant walk in the mountains with Trekking. In this family eurogame, each player will take a different route and earn points based on the paths they take, the animals they see, and the peaks they conquer. It's a race against other players where you must carefully plan your route to achieve all your goals without losing all your energy.

Trek solo or with friends You can climb and descend the various peaks with your friends or play in the solo mode. In this mode, you'll place aimless hikers (the usual Sunday walkers) who play automatically. Additionally, you can choose between the basic or advanced mode, which will make your day in the mountains a bit more interesting.

Trekking is a dynamic eurogame with a wide variety of objectives and a storytelling element. The cards you place at the beginning of the game on your board (weather, peak, terrain, fauna, and shelter) will create a narrative phrase with your day's goal. As you traverse the mountains from point to point, you'll have the opportunity to see and collect animals and peaks. When the 12 hours of hiking are up, which in the game translate to 12 rounds, you’ll check your route on the GPS, which will have recorded your entire journey. That's when you gather with the other hikers around the fireplace to talk about your day, or in other words, count the points to see who is the best hiker.

Die Triqueta, der Knoten der Dreisamkeit, steht für die Verbindung von drei Dingen. In dem gleichnamigen Familienspiel wird diese durch hölzerne Tiersteine symbolisiert, die jeweils zu Trios zusammengelegt werden müssen. Entscheidend ist dabei, dass für jede der sechs Tierarten nur eine Triqueta existieren darf. Wird das Gleichgewicht dagegen durch weitere Steine der gleichen Tierart gestört, erhalten die Spielenden Minuspunkte.

In jeder der vier Runden können die Spielenden entscheiden, ob sie neue Tiersteine ziehen bzw. aufdecken oder eine bereits ausliegende Tierreihe nehmen und aus der Runde aussteigen. Dazu gilt es, den passenden Moment abzupassen, um eine möglichst lukrative Reihe zu ergattern bevor eine*r der Mitspielenden diese wegschnappt. Wer es mit dem richtigen Timing schafft, möglichst vollständige Triquetas zu legen und dabei keine überschüssigen Tiere hat, wird die Partie gewinnen.

Die Triqueta 2te Edition enthält auch die Erweiterung Hidden Wolves. Mit ihr hält nicht nur eine neue Variante für zwei Personen Einzug, sondern auch freundliche, aber scheue Wölfe. Sie verbergen sich bis zum Spielende im Schatten und sind als Triqueta viele Punkte wert. Doch unter den Schatten-Tiersteinen sind auch Tiere jeder anderen Tierart. Wer die richtige Balance aus Risikofreude und Vorausplanung schafft, kann die Wölfe punktebringend einsetzen.

Author: Pim Thunborg
Illustrator: Edu Valls
Publisher: B-rex Entertainment

Ein Spiel über echte Trolle, Möchtegerntrolle, Menschen und... Trolle!
Wer reich wie ein Troll sein will, muss den Bergkönig schon ordentlich beeindrucken! Stehlt mit eurer Trollmagie Prinzessinnen, tauscht Kinder aus und richtet eure Höhlen ein.

Trolle sind nicht groß und dumm, wie viele glauben machen wollen. Vor nicht allzu langer Zeit lebten sie unter uns und benutzten ihre schlaue Magie, um wie wir Menschen auszusehen. Sie lebten mit ihrem Vieh in den Bergen. Ihre Höhlen waren schön und luxuriös, mit viel Silber, Gold und Edelsteinen und einem Tisch voller köstlicher Speisen. In Schweden gibt es dafür den Ausdruck "Reich wie ein Troll". Trolle waren nicht böse, wenn man sie nicht schlecht behandelte, sie konnten sogar hilfreich sein für diejenigen, die sie gut behandelten. Aber sie spielten den Menschen oft Streiche. Ihre magische Kraft (Trollkraft) konnte die Sicht der Menschen verzerren, sodass der Troll wie ein Mensch, ein Tier, ein Baumstamm oder ein Stein aussah und sogar unsichtbar wurde. Aber sie hatten auch einige Schwächen. Sie konnten den Klang von Kirchenglocken oder Stahl nicht ertragen, ganz zu schweigen vom Anblick der Sonne.

Trolle mögen Prinzessinnen ist ein "Worker Movement"-Spiel. Du spielst als einer von vier Trollclans und versuchst, die Gunst des Bergkönigs zu erlangen, indem du ihn beeindruckst. Die Spieler erhalten Gunst (in Form von Siegpunkten), wenn sie das tun, was Trolle normalerweise tun: Wechselbälger austauschen, Menschen "anheuern", Kirchenglocken abreißen, Prinzessinnen entführen, ihre Höhle bauen und Trollmagie einsetzen. Um erfolgreich zu sein, müssen die Spieler Ressourcen sammeln und ihre Trolle bewegen, um verschiedene Aktionen durchzuführen. Der Spieler, der am Ende die meisten Siegpunkte hat, kann sich zum ultimativen Anführer eines Trollclans krönen.

Trolle mögen Prinzessinnen ist leicht zu erlernen, aber schwer zu meistern. Es bringt frischen Wind ins Genre, da ihr mit den anderen Clans zusammenarbeiten und gleichzeitig den meisten Nutzen daraus ziehen müsst.

After the Moonfall ist ein Tischrollenspiel in der Welt von Tsukuyumi und bietet eine reiche Storyworld, in der eine düstere Zukunft in bunten Farben leuchtet. Erwecke humanoide Wildschweine zum Leben, spiele als mächtiger Landwal, mystischer Pandakrieger oder menschliche*r Überlebende*r und bringe neues Gleichgewicht und Frieden in diese verzerrte Welt.

Den Kern von After the Moonfall bildet das “Style-Not-Skill”-System, ein neu entwickeltes Regelsystem, dass eine ganze Reihe von Vorteilen mit sich bringt:

  • Narration geht vor

  • Kein Micromanagement für Spielleiter

  • Volle narrative Freiheit

  • Individuelle Charaktergestaltung

  • Alle Regeln auf deinem Charakterbogen

  • Power to the Players

  • Einsteigerfreundlich

Schon im Aufbau des Buches zeigt sich die storybetonte Struktur des Spiels, nehmen die Regeln doch gerade einemal 1/8 des Buches ein und Story & Hintergrund 5/8 (Der Rest sind Abenteuer und Spielleitermaterial). Nicht nur die aus anderen im Tskuyumi-Universum angesiedelten Spielen bekannten Fraktionen können gewählt werden, sondern auch einige Neue, wie z.B. CorpoRats und uralte Götter und deren Anhänger.

Das Buch hat 450 vollfarbige Seiten und über 350 Illustrationen.

In the Irish myth cycles, the land of Tír na nÓg is the realm of the Otherworld, the place where the Fairies lived and heroes visited on quests. It was a place just outside the realm of man, off to the west, where there was no illness or death or time, but only happiness and beauty.

The golden path to Tír na nÓg is open once more, and the greatest Celtic storytellers have gathered for a once-in-a-lifetime journey. When they return, they'll bring with them tales of the creatures they met and the adventures they lived. Over time those stories will become a saga — and the most epic saga will live on forever.

Journey to the Otherworld in Tír na nÓg by placing storytellers between story cards in the shared grid. When all storytellers have been placed, in reverse player order draft cards and add them to your hand. From your hand, you'll then add cards to your personal tableau: one card to hand, one card played. At the end of five rounds, score each row according to the rules on its corresponding goal card, and earn points for having the most connected story cards of each color. The highest score wins.

Theme or setting:20th Century Vienna

In the early 1900s, the Austrian neurologist Sigmund Freud established a revolutionary theory called psychoanalysis, related to the study of the unconscious mind. As his work took hold, supporters met at Freud's apartment every Wednesday to discuss psychology and dream symbolism. This group—the Wednesday Psychological Society—marked the beginning of the worldwide psychoanalytic movement.

As a member of this society, you aim to formulate new therapeutic techniques, establish a practice, grow your clientele, and become Freud’s most distinguished contemporary. To best accomplish this, you’ll need to share insights, discuss ideas with peers, and publish theories. And to stay invigorated, you’ll likely need some coffee—lots of coffee.

Unconscious Mind is a euro-style game featuring worker placement, engine building, multiple rondels, and cascading effects. On your turn, you may place one or two Ideas (workers) on a central Meeting Table to access a variety of actions, such as adding tiles to your player board, drafting and playing cards, and moving around the city of Vienna. Where you place your Ideas also determines how far to advance your rondel’s inkpot, activating a row or column of tile effects on your player board.

To treat your clients and interpret their dreams, you must work with a supply of Insight resources, which you’ll manage on a multi-level dial. As you work through surface-level Manifest dreams into deep-seated Latent dreams, these Insights will help your clients reach catharsis. This is represented by lifting transparent layers from the client cards—unlocking their ongoing special abilities and end-game scoring opportunities.

Once the group has solidified its reputation, the end of the game is signaled, and the member with the most points wins.

The battle for Callisto is about to begin: it's time to choose your side.

For over 300 million years, trees have traded with fungi in an underground symbiotic relationship known as mycorrhizas (my-co-RISE-ahs). Trees offer some of the carbon they photosynthesize in exchange for nutrients that the fungi extract from the soil. Scientists continue to make new discoveries about this hidden world. Including hints that some of the carbon may go through the fungal network and into trees’ seedlings.

In this game, you will play a mature Douglas-fir tree in the Pacific Northwest of North America. Your goal is to establish seedlings and help them successfully grow into trees. At the end of the game, the player who has grown the most successful set of seedlings with the most valuable symbiotic relationships will win.

In battle, there are no equals.

Unmatched is a highly asymmetrical miniature fighting game for two or four players. Each hero is represented by a unique deck designed to evoke their style and legend. Tactical movement and no-luck combat resolution create a unique play experience that rewards expertise, but just when you've mastered one set, new heroes arrive to provide all new match-ups.

Combat is resolved quickly by comparing attack and defense cards. However, each card's unique effects and a simple but deep timing system lead to interesting decisions each time. The game also features an updated version of the line-of-sight system from Tannhäuser for ranged attacks and area effects.

All the world's a stage in Unmatched: Slings and Arrows, while the Globe Theater is a battlefield. William Shakespeare steps up to the fight along with three of his wondrous characters: The Wayward Sisters, Hamlet, and Titania. Shakespeare's deck, designed by Jonathan Guberman, was one of the winning decks in a 2020 design competition, and it rewards players for completing lines in iambic pentameter. The Wayward Sisters, a runner-up in that competition from Jason Hager, is a multi-hero deck that challenges you to bring the witches' potion machinations to life with cunning co-ordination.

Until Proven Guilty is a narrative and collaborative game inspired by court-themed visual novels, television series, and video games.
You take on the role of a brilliant lawyer, still a rookie, involved in complicated criminal trials. Will you be able to help Peter defend his client?
Each turn, read the Charge card and choose an Evidence to rebut it. Enter the trial number into the web app and read the result: if it's correct, some jurors will side with you, and you can continue in the trial; if it's wrong, some jurors may side with your opponent, and you will have to try again. Depending on the evidence you choose, you may even receive personalized answers!
Argument after argument, you'll reach the end of the case. Your final score will depend on how many jurors declare the defendant as innocent!

For eons, the happy Sognae and the sad Incubi have dwelled as opposed but complementary forces in the library-city of dreams.

Your task in Urbion is to maintain this delicate equilibrium: Place the dreams in the various districts of the city, and balance their strengths so that neither group becomes more powerful than the other.

During the game, you want to claim all the city cards by playing your dream cards so that the positive and negative values balance each other out. Manage your cards wisely by placing them in the best spots or by discarding them to trigger powerful effects that will help you achieve your goal.

The second edition of Urbion features new art by Elise Plessis and seven expansions.

VHS: VERY HORROR STORIES - SECOND SERIES

Demons, monsters and bloodthirsty killers lurk in the darkest recesses of our world, inhumane beings who know only violence and, driven by vengeance or evil, wish for only one thing. The suffering of their prey. Yours.

Take up your torches, venture in their own realms and do what you can to make it out alive.

 

VHS: Very Horror Stories is a Horror Role Play Game inspired by ‘70’s till nowadays classics such as Hellraiser, Nightmare, Alien, Halloween and many more, coming in six stand-alone boxed sets that allow you to play in a different subgenre of Horror each.

VHS: DEADBREAK

THEY ARE COMING…

Can you hear their step and the grinning of hundreds of jaws? They are coming for you and there is nothing you can do to stop them. Grab everything you can to face them and pray you can survive their passage… or give up and join the horde.

 

Welcome to Deadbreak, the VHS dedicated to zombie movies. Get ready to face hordes of corpses risen from their graves and zombies infected by parasites under the dreadful yoke of the Lords of the Horde.

No shelter is safe from their passage.

No amount of ammunition is enough to exterminate them.

No night shall be left silent, now that their cries echo in the streets.

 

This is Deadbreak and there is no escape from contamination.

VHS: VERY HORROR STORIES (SECOND SERIES) - HORRORFEST

Demons, monsters and bloodthirsty killers lurk in the darkest recesses of our world, inhumane beings who know only violence and, driven by vengeance or evil, wish for only one thing. The suffering of their prey. Yours.

Take up your torches, venture in their own realms and do what you can to make it out alive.

 

VHS: Very Horror Stories is a Horror Role Play Game inspired by ‘70’s till nowadays classics such as Hellraiser, Nightmare, Alien, Halloween and many more, coming in six stand-alone boxed sets that allow you to play in a different subgenre of Horror each.

A PARTY OF HORROR

Horrorfest is one of the many spawn of VHS’s second Kickstarter campaign. The idea was to give you an empty box set fillable with the various elements of all the other VHS, to always have a unique combination of materials on hand, be it Deadbreak’s Monsters, Bloodlust’s Characters and Trashbag’s maps… or even your very own creations! This fully customizable box is meant to be the ultimate expression of your creativity.

However, Horrorfest also contains all the Stretch Goals unlocked in the Kickstarter campaign, turning into a VHS bursting at the seams with additional contents.

Horrorfest, then, can be purchased in either of two ways. Either as an “empty” VHS (one that is anything but empty, as you will see later) or as a VHS including all or part of the Kickstarter exclusive content.

 

So, what’s in the box?

Horrorfest, standard version: available for purchase only during the Kickstarter campaign or at the conventions we attend. It includes the Horrorfest box, a book with 10 Films and the rules to play 10 new Main Sets and 10 Monsters, 10 Characters and 10 Main Sets in digital format.

Horrorfest, full version: available for purchase only during the Kickstarter campaign. It includes the Horrorfest box, a book with 10 Films and the rules for 10 new Side Sets, plus 10 physical packets with 1 Monster, 1 Character and 1 Main Set each (if you participated to the Kickstarter campaign, you know they were all available for separate purchase, so you might find yourself with less elements than listed). All the contents above are also in digital format.

Horrorfest Packets: available for purchase only during the Kickstarter campaign or at the conventions we attend. If you purchased Horrorfest standard version or the full version but with only some of the 10 packets available during the campaign, you will be able to purchase the others separately. Each packet includes 1 Monster, 1 Character and 1 Main Set.

THE GATES HAVE OPENED

The realm of the dead is separated from ours by nothing more than a veil, a thin layer of reality that keeps us (maybe of our own volition) from seeing what lies on the other side. You can, however. You can cross the threshold of the afterlife. Will you be able to face what lurks in there? 

 

Welcome to Remnants, the VHS dedicated to ghost movies. Prepare to storm the gates of the afterlife, face its condemned denizens and save your soul from remaining trapped where the dead dwell.

No armor can save your soul from the jaws of the damned.

No prayer shall stave off their desperate greed.

No key shall bring you back home.

 

This is Remnants, and this is the domain of the dead.

Demons, monsters and bloodthirsty killers lurk in the darkest recesses of our world, inhumane beings who know only violence and, driven by vengeance or evil, wish for only one thing. The suffering of their prey. Yours.

Take up your torches, venture in their own realms and do what you can to make it out alive.

 

VHS: Very Horror Stories is a Horror Role Play Game inspired by ‘70’s till nowadays classics such as Hellraiser, Nightmare, Alien, Halloween and many more, coming in six stand-alone boxed sets that allow you to play in a different subgenre of Horror each.

WHAT’S THIS STENCH!?

What you are smelling is not a stench, but the smell of trash. Ok, maybe they are the same thing, but it is not just any pile of junk, oh no. It’s something “carefully assembled to throw you into the deep end of B-movies”. It even has the capital B!

 

Welcome to Trashbag, the VHS dedicated to trash movies. Prepare to traverse the gates of, well, common sense and see how far you can lower the bar for a B-movie. Harness the sheer insanity of the trash to, finally, eventually, nonsensically make your way to the credits (so you can also see who directed this bulls**t).

No actor shall be better than “atrocious”.

No scenario shall ever be absurd enough.

Nobody shall ever have any bloody clue of what in the name of everything holy (and a good bit of what is not) is happening on screen, but this is why it shall be beyond!

 

This is Trashbag, and no matter how hard you scrape, there is no limit to the bottom of the barrel.

Take on the role of four Valkyries who, tired of waiting for the last battle, the battle of the end times, have decided to take the lead and, supported by Freya, rush into battle to try to prevent Ragnarök itself. Face mighty wyrms, cunning dark elves, draugr risen from the depths of Hel, tough frost giants and fearsome fire demons. Defeat them and maybe you will win the favour of the gods and they will aid you in your quest. For Asgard!

Valkyries is presented as a game book. Each chapter introduces new rules and a Battleground to play them on. Throughout the first three chapters you will learn the rules progressively, moving around the Battlefield, eliminating as many enemies as you can, playing your cards as wisely as you can. Compete with your sister warriors to see who should lead the team. Once you've mastered the basics, you can play Full Mode on any isolated Battlefield, venture into the Vanaheim campaign, chronicled in the last chapter, or create your own scenarios and campaigns.

The modularity of the game makes it accessible for casual players or a challenge for the most demanding players, as well as making it highly replayable. Quick games, long campaigns, rule combinations... Everything is available to players in a simple and easy to configure way. As if that wasn't enough, additional content will be added periodically to extend the hours of gameplay even further.

Welcome to Valroc, the famous city of wizards. You are one of them competing in a great tournament to acquire the Archmage title. Will you take risks in fighting mythical creatures, use black magic or rely on your own knowledge to achieve this actions? Train yourself, attend magical lessons and make offerings to the gods… As many possible strategies as imaginable but only yours will lead you to victory!

In Valroc, you play wizards in competition to acquire the Archmage title. For that, you will have to defeat terrible creatures (or tame them). The first player who has defeated or tamed six creatures ends the game. The winner is the player with the most Prestige Points.

The game is split into two different phases :
• The first one is a draft phase in which the players must select the creatures they will have to fight. Thereby they will prepare their tournament as well as possible.
• The second phase is the tournament in which the players will fight against each other by a worker placement mechanism.

Author: David Ausloos
Illustrator: David Ausloos
Publisher: Ludolux S.à r.l.
Vendor: Ludolux S.à r.l.
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:29.95 €

Theme or setting:Vampire, Dörfler, Schätze

Taucht ein in Vampire Nights, ein spannendes Dungeon-Abenteuer für 2–4 Spieler! Werdet zu furchtlosen königlichen Wachen, deren Aufgabe es ist, gruselige Räume zu erkunden, Blutsauger zu bekämpfen, Dorfbewohner zu retten und verborgene Reichtümer aufzudecken. Aber Vorsicht! Jeder Vampirbiss schwächt euch und riskiert eure Verwandlung in genau die Monster, die ihr jagt! Werdet ihr drei schreckliche Nächte überleben und als Sieger hervorgehen?

Spielt Vampire Nights und findet es heraus!

Author: James Faulkner and Dan Knight
Publisher: Warlord Games
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:1 - 4
Retail price:-
Playing time:90 minutes

An exciting resource management, capture and control board game set in World War 2

Author: Zong-Ger(蔥哥)
Illustrator: Nadia Carrim
Publisher: Arcane Wonders
Vendor: Arcane Wonders
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:2 - 6
Retail price:15.00 €
Playing time:20 minutes

Grow your vegetables, manipulate the market, and make a fortune in Vegetable Stock! But beware, the market could crash at any moment!

First debuted as Small Farmer, is a card game about vegetable economics now featuring all new artwork and part of the Dice Tower Essentials line.

Each card has three vegetable icons on it, with vegetables coming in five types. Players take turns choosing one of the cards and placing it in their harvest pile face down. The price of the vegetable(s) on the card not chosen goes up — but if the price goes too high, it crashes, although it can rise again next round. After six rounds, determine your score by multiplying the number of each vegetable you have harvested by the final price of that vegetable. The player with the highest score wins!

Authors: Yang, Zong-Hua
Illustrators: Chen, Poki
Publisher: frechverlag GmbH
Release date:01/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 6
Retail price:12.99 €
Playing time:15 minutes

Das schnelle Spiel an der Gemüse-Börse

Wer zur Erntezeit gekonnt an der Preisschraube dreht, kann auch mit Grünzeug ein Vermögen verdienen! Aber Vorsicht beim Spekulieren, sonst stürzt der Kurs plötzlich ins Bodenlose ...

Einfachste Regeln und trotzdem unbegrenzter Wiederspielwert? Das kann nur Veggie Crash sein! Man muss kein Finanzgenie sein, um beim Wetten auf die Kurse der vier schmackhaften Gemüsesorten mitzumischen. Aber nur wer seine Karten clever ausspielt und die anderen am Tisch richtig einschätzt, geht aus dem Börsencrash am Wochenmarkt mit vollen Taschen nach Hause. 

Der knackige Spiele-Snack für Zwischendurch, der einfach immer wieder auf den Tisch kommen wird!

Inhalt:

  • 58 Karten

  • Wertungsblock

  • Anleitung

Spielprinzip: 
Reihum nehmen alle je eine Karte aus einer Auslage auf die Hand. Eine Karte bleibt übrig und steigert den Marktwert verschiedener Gemüsesorten. Doch wenn der Wert einer Sorte zu hoch steigt, gibt es einen Börsencrash und er sinkt wieder auf Null. Nach sechs Runden bekommt man Punkte für die sechs Handkarten. Wer das wertvollste Gemüse gesammelt hat, gewinnt. 

2–6 Personen | Ab 8 Jahren | 15 Minuten Spielzeit

Author: Raf Peeters
Publisher: SmartGames
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:1
Retail price:25 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:Kerker, Verlies

Der Kerker steckt voller Hindernisse und Gefahren – führe deinen Superhelden sicher durch die alten Mauern, doch Vorsicht vor dem Monster! Finde den magischen Schlüssel und öffne die Tür, um endlich zu entkommen.

Author: Charlie Bink
Illustrator: Melanie Friedli
Publisher: Game Factory
Vendor: Carletto Deutschland GmbH
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 5
Retail price:11.99 €
Playing time:30 minutes

In Verhext musst du vor jeder Runde deine Stiche ansagen: Dabei kannst du entweder eine exakte Ansage machen (z.B. «3 Stiche»), die mehr Punkte bringt, oder eine vage (z.B. «mind. 3 Stiche») für weniger Punkte, da sie einfacher zu erfüllen ist. Du meinst, das ist kein Hexenwerk? Dann hast du die Rechnung aber ohne deine Mitspieler mit ihren Zaubertränken gemacht!

Es ist manchmal wie verhext, den einen fehlenden Stich noch zu bekommen … Liegst du mit deiner Ansage daneben, erhältst du Minuspunkte, die du aber in einer späteren Runde bei korrekter Ansage wieder in Pluspunkte umwandeln könntest. Doch macht das Sinn oder ist eine neue Ansage nicht vielversprechender?

Author: Jean-Xia Chou
Illustrator: Laura Bazzoni
Publisher: HUCH!
Vendor: Hutter Trade GmbH + CO KG
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:3 - 8
Retail price:16.99 €
Playing time:15 minutes

Heute ist Zahltag! Die Meuterer, eine Gruppe rebellischer Piraten, haben die Truhe mit dem Kriegsschatz ihrer Crew auf raffinierte Weise umgeworfen, um zu verhindern, dass die Beute aufgeteilt wird! Die Piraten – begierig auf das, was ihnen versprochen wurde – versuchen, die Truhe zu füllen, während die Meuterer alles tun, um sie daran zu hindern und Chaos auf dem Schiff zu stiften. Die Meuterei steht kurz bevor!

  • Social Deduction mit Piraten-Feeling

  • Perfekt für Gruppen, zum Kennenlernen, Auflockern, gemeinsam Lachen

Author: Dinosaur
Illustrator: Marc Larivière
Publisher: Randolph
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:3 - 6
Retail price:10 €
Playing time:20 minutes
Theme or setting:Dinosaur

In Very Bad Lands, you will play different Dinosaur species battling for your very survival. Disasters are a constant threat, so you’ll have to make the right choices to avoid them!

On your turn, you will make a simple, yet crucial, decision: Keep your card or swap it, either with the person to your left or with the card in the middle of the table. You don’t want to have the card with the lowest number, because at the end of the round, when all cards are revealed, the Dinosaur with the lowest number loses 1 Life!

Too easy? Actually, nothing was easy during the age of the Dinosaurs… Some cards have disastrous effects that turn the whole game upside down! The good news is that your Dinosaur has a special power that can help you survive, or that might push your opponents to the brink of extinction.

The game ends when a Dinosaur loses all its lives, and all the others share the glorious victory!

Every game promises a unique and epic gaming experience filled with dizzying highs and crushing lows… and yes, CHAOS.

Will you have the wits to keep your Dinosaur alive through the effects of meteorite strikes, landslides, and droughts; or will your species be condemned to the tar-pits of history?

For more fun, try mixing this box with Very Bad Lands - T-rex

KEY POINTS

• Twice the fun: Both Very Bad Lands boxes (T-Rex and Brachio) can be combined for even more disasters, Dinosaurs, and, of course, chaos... for up to 10 players!
• One very simple choice: Keep your card or swap it? A straightforward choice to make once per turn, keeping in mind the Dinosaurs’ unique powers.
• Spread chaos: Not only do the Dinosaurs’ power throw a wrench into the game’s mechanisms, but the effects of the Disasters also create chaos.
• Inclusive: Perfect for 3 to 6 players, it's the ideal game for gatherings with friends and family.
• Thematic immersion: Let yourselves be transported into the prehistoric world with wonderful illustrations straight from the pen of the game's designer himself: Marc Larivière!

Authors: Patrick Matheus, André Luiz Silva Negrão
Illustrator: Rodrigo Camilo Alves De Almeida Natalia Bacetti Marcelo Bastos Amanda Duarte Raqsonu Duhu Marcela Freire Tamie Gadelha Michel Gomes Marília Gomes Ivan Inagaki Yan Kyohara Filipe Laurentino Renato Leôncio Gustavo Lima Limetown Studios Raphael Massarani Patrick Matheus Maxime Moulins Harumi Namba Marcelo Rahsdra Thiago Richau Ernanda Souza Jessé Suursso Lucas Torquato João Vagner
Publisher: Arcane Wonders
Vendor: Arcane Wonders
Release date:11/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:2 - 5
Retail price:60.00 €
Playing time:50 minutes
Theme or setting:1990's Video games

The 1990s. The Golden Age of 16-Bit video games. A simpler time when every kid’s dreams revolved around becoming the next Video Game Champion!

Video Game Champion is a competitive strategy board game for 2 to 5 players that takes 50-90 minutes to play. You and your friends are ’90s kids dividing your time and attention between earning money, studying, renting video games, buying game strategy magazines, begging your parents to buy you video games as presents and, ultimately, playing as many video games as you can. Do you have what it takes to rise above the competition and become the next Video Game Champion?

Author: Guy-Roger Duvert
Illustrator: Benjamin Sjöberg
Publisher: Board Game Box Publishing
Vendor: Board Game Box GmbH
Release date:04/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:56 €
Playing time:90 minutes
Theme or setting:Cyberpunk

NEO PARIS, 2047 …

Die technologische Revolution ist wirklich passiert, nur leider nicht so, wie von allen gehofft. 

Sie sorgte nicht für mehr Kontrolle über unsere Realität, sondern ermöglichte eine Flucht aus ihr. Alles begann mit einfachen Spielen, virtuellen Welten, die „Verses“ genannt wurden. Die Spieler konnten mit ihren Avataren verschiedene Settings erkunden – das Mittelalter, den Weltraum, den Wilden Westen …

Da sie irgendwann die Realität nicht mehr von den immer realistischeren Simulationen unterscheiden konnten, ist heute fast jeder dauerhaft mit den Verses verbunden.

Nach einem gnadenlosen Kampf gegen deine korrupte Konkurrenz übernimmst du als Leiter eines multinationalen Konzerns, der virtuelle Universen kreiert, die Kontrolle über Neo Paris und den Verse-Markt. Erhöhe deinen Einfluss, richte Server ein, entwickle Verses und rekrutiere Agenten, die sich die Hände für dich schmutzig machen. Gerate dabei jedoch nicht ins Visier der Necromancer. Diese Cyberterroristen,
die auch als Necros bekannt sind, werden alles tun, um dich auszuschalten.

Author: Guy-Roger Duvert
Illustrator: Benjamin Sjöberg
Publisher: Board Game Box Publishing
Vendor: Board Game Box GmbH
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:16 and up
Number of players:1
Retail price:14.99 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Comic zum Buch zum Spiel

Die Revolution ist wirklich passiert, nur leider nicht so, wie von allen gehofft.

Wir schreiben das Jahr 2042. Der Großteil der Bevölkerung verbringt seine Zeit online, vernetzt in virtuellen Welten, wo alle Wünsche erfüllt werden.

Zwischen den Türmen von Neo-Paris versucht der Polizist Nash Trenton, den Tod seiner Freundin zu verarbeiten. Ihr Ableben scheint natürlich. Doch könnte es sein, dass die Erklärung für ihren Tod online zu finden ist?

Author: Gy-Roger Duvert
Illustrators: James Hayball, Rutger van den Steeg
Publisher: Board Game Box Publishing
Vendor: Board Game Box GmbH
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:16 and up
Number of players:1
Retail price:24.99 €
Playing time:300 minutes
Theme or setting:Buch zum Spiel

m Jahr 2046 flüchten drei Viertel der Menschheit aus dem realen Leben in virtuelle Welten. Unsere Gesellschaft hat sich verändert und in drei Gruppen gespalten: Es gibt die sogenannten Vernetzten, VR-Junkies, die süchtig sind nach dem Leben in den künstlichen Welten. Außerdem die Lebendigen, die sich dieser Technologie verweigern, aus philosophischen und religiösen Gründen oder weil sie begütert genug sind, um das Leben in der realen Welt noch genießen zu können. Und schließlich die Hybriden, die ihre Zeit zwischen dem realen Leben und den virtuellen Welten aufteilen.

Der Hybride Nash Trenton ist ein ehemaliger Polizist, der mittlerweile in Neo-Paris als Privatdetektiv arbeitet. Er bekommt den Auftrag, unerklärlichen und scheinbar übernatürlichen Erscheinungen in den Online-Welten auf den Grund zu gehen. In New York befasst sich die hochbegabte junge Interpol-Agentin Genna, die den Reizen der virtuellen Welten konsequent widersteht, mit einer Serie seltsamer Mordfälle, die alle eins gemeinsam haben: Die Täter sind Vernetzte. Und in Tokio lebt die junge Vernetzte Rei in einem heruntergekommenen Apartmenthaus glücklich mit ihrer Freundin zusammen. Die beiden verbringen ihre Zeit gemeinsam online, bis eines Tages Männer in Schwarz mit kybernetischen Prothesen die Freundin brutal entführen und Rei umbringen wollen. Rei, dem realen Leben längst entwöhnt, macht sich trotzdem furchtlos auf die Suche nach ihrer Freundin.

Ein Hybrider, eine Lebendige und eine Vernetzte – drei miteinander verknüpfte Schicksale in einer verfallenden Gesellschaft, die ihre alten Probleme überwunden, dabei aber neue geschaffen hat …

Virtual Revolution 2046 ist der vierte Roman des französischen Regisseurs, Filmmusikkomponisten und Schriftstellers Guy-Roger Duvert, der seit etwa zehn Jahren in Los Angeles lebt. Nachdem sein erster Roman Outsphere 2019 in Frankreich den Prix Amazon TV5 Monde errang, stürzt er sich hier erneut in das Universum, das er mit seinem Spielfilm Virtual Revolution geschaffen hat, der 2016 in die Kinos kam und weltweit auf Filmfestivals mit über 50 Preisen ausgezeichnet wurde. Die Romanhandlung spielt vor den Ereignissen des Films – man muss ihn also nicht gesehen haben, um ihr folgen zu können – und schildert die Auswirkungen der virtuellen Realität auf die menschliche Gesellschaft.

Author: Paloma J. Pascual y Abraham Sánchez
Illustrator: David GJ
Publisher: Tranjis Games

Release date:11/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:24.95 €
Playing time:20 minutes
Theme or setting:Virus! Roll&Write

The research area at General Hospital is experiencing busy times. You are students in practices and you are competing to get a scholarship at the center. Your mission will be to investigate vaccines against four different viruses that have the health community worried.

For such an important and noble mission you will have to manage all the resources at your disposal. Conduct clinical trials quickly to get ahead of your competitors and decide whether to collaborate to advance hand in hand or make things difficult for them... always being careful not to contaminate the samples with viruses!

Will you be up to the challenge?

Author: Maxine Metzger
Illustrator: Maxine Metzger
Publisher: Self-Published
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:2 - 6
Retail price:15 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Witches

When the moon rises, the witches gather for a friendly contest of skills: They exchange crystals for ingredients, which they need to conjure spells. For successful spells, they gain magic. Who will be able to gather enough magic the fastest?

Witchcraft - Midnights is an expansion for Witchcraft - Moonlight Magic which spices up the base game by adding three new modules that can be mixed and matched to taste. Events that are triggered whenever a witch casts a spell, making it harder to plan ahead and adding more surprises each round. They affect everyone and can be good or bad. Additionally, rituals can be obtained. They function as secret objectives that grant the witches magic upon completion. Witchcraft - Midnights also comes with eight new familars, whose abilities tend to be more confrontational than the ones in the base game. With these additional familiars, players may now always choose from two face-up options.

Playing Age:6 and up
Number of players:2 - 8
Retail price:5 €
Playing time:10 minutes
Theme or setting:Dogs

Fill your week of dogs, scoring the most points in the process. Each dog has unique rules of play, some cancel scores, some swap dogs, other special cards affect game play. One deck is needed per two people playing.

Publisher: Pegasus Spiele

Number of players:1 - 4
Retail price:34.99 €

Theme or setting:Waffeln

Es ist ein herrlichen Morgen und du entspannst auf dem Sofa.
Doch was ist das für ein himmlischer Duft, der aus der Kücher herüberweht? Aber natürlich: Heute ist Waffelzeit!

Sammle Kombinationen aus Früchten und Sahne, um deine Waffeln noch schmackhafter zu machen. Erschaffe Muster und beträufle sie mit Sirup, um Schlemmerpunkte zu erhalten. Deine Auswahl beeinflusst nicht nur die Wertung, sondern auch die Zugreihenfolge und wie viel Sirup dir zur Verfügung steht. Nach 8 schnellen Runden gewinnt die Person mit der leckersten Waffel!

Release date:03/2024
Playing Age:10 and up

Retail price:30 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Food

It’s a wonderful lazy morning and your stomach is grumbling. What’s that heavenly smell coming from the kitchen? It’s Waffle Time!

Draft combinations of fruit toppings and whipped cream to load up your waffle. Create patterns to spread syrup for scoring points. What you draft not only affects your score, but also your turn order and how much syrup you can use. After eight quick rounds, the player with the highest scoring waffle is the winner!

Author: Julian Asleh
Illustrator: Xue Cui
Publisher: Pektis Studio
Release date:06/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:1 - 5
Retail price:60 €
Playing time:90 minutes

Experience the adventure of a lifetime with "Wanderlust - Discover the World" from Pektis Studio! Immerse yourself in a board game that takes you on a fascinating journey around the globe. Every game of Wanderlust transports you to the most amazing places on Earth, where you’ll explore exotic destinations, overcome thrilling challenges, and discover the richness of different cultures. This game brings the world directly into your living room, turning every game night into an unforgettable journey of discovery.

Imagine traveling to distant lands, unveiling mysterious landscapes, and fully embracing your sense of adventure alongside friends or family. With its high-quality design and innovative game mechanics, Wanderlust will quickly become the highlight of your board game collection. Visit us at Essen Spiel 2024 and secure your own copy of Wanderlust - Discover the World. Discover the world on the game board and start your journey with Pektis Studio today!

Authors: Dave Neale, David Thompson
Illustrator: Kwanchai Moriya
Publisher: Osprey Games
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:1 - 6
Retail price:50 €
Playing time:60 minutes
Theme or setting:Spy Thriller

A choose-your-own-adventure board game set in World War II occupied France, capturing the stakes and tension of espionage and resistance warfare.

Darkness covers your approach as you alight on the riverbank. Swiftly, you hide the boat and shoulder your gear. The mission is clear: capture or kill your target; rendezvous at the extraction point; get out. You have two days. Nodding to your team, you set off toward the glowing lights of Vaillant.

War Story: Occupied France is a cooperative narrative game for one to six players. Your team of covert operatives is all that stands between the infamous German officer Heidenreich and the systematic destruction of French Resistance forces in Morette. Through three replayable story missions, you must exploit the specialties of your chosen agents to uncover information, enlist allies, and obtain weaponry. Engage occupying forces on tactical encounter maps, where careless positioning could cost your agents' lives. Remember, no plan survives contact with the enemy. And time is running out.

Author: David J. Mortimer
Illustrator: Klemens Franz
Publisher: Frosted Games, 2Tomatoes Games
Vendor: Frosted Games
Release date:01/2024
Playing Age:12 and up
Number of players:1 - 3
Retail price:19.95 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Historisch

Von 1065 bis 1067 kam es in den nördlichen Königreichen des heutigen Spaniens zu einem Konflikt zwischen den drei Herrschern Sancho Ramirez de Aragón, Sancho II de Castilla, und Sancho Garcés IV de Nájera-Pamplona, der als „Guerra de los Tres Sanchos“ in die Geschichte einging.

In War of the 3 Sanchos erleben 1 – 3 Spieler:innen das strategische Kräftemessen dieser drei Herrscher.

In diesem Spiel von David J. Mortimer verkörpert ihr je einen der drei Könige, die um die Vorherrschaft über das umkämpfte Gebiet streiten. In jeder Partie wetteifert und kämpft ihr darum, Burgen und Türme zu besetzen und zu belagern, um den Konflikt am Ende als alleiniger Sieger für euch zu entscheiden.

Das Spiel lässt sich perfekt zu dritt, zu zweit sowie auch solo spielen! Durch das Ausspielen von Aktionskarten steckt ihr einen Rahmen ab, in dem eure Mitspieler:innen agieren müssen und nur wer seine Gegner:innen gerissen zu steuern vermag, wird den Krieg der 3 Sanchos gewinnen.

Eine weitere großartige Pocket Campaign aus der Feder von David J Mortimer mit spannendem Kartenmanagement und innovativem und frischen Kampf-System. Illustiert wurde das Spiel von Klemens Franz.

Authors: Roberto Di Meglio, Marco Maggi, Francesco Nepitello
Publisher: Ares Games
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:13 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:14.90 €
Playing time:150 minutes
Theme or setting:The Lord of the Rings

For all War of the Ring Second Edition enthusiasts who want to protect the bases of their miniatures, while enjoying an easy and quick way to recognize them at a glance on the game board, here's the ideal solution for the three expansions: War of the Ring Colored Plastic Rings Expansion Accessory!

This set includes colored plastic rings to customize all three War of the Ring 2nd Edition expansions: Lords of Middle-earth, Warriors of Middle-earth and Kings of Middle-earth. The set includes at least 8 small soft rubber rings and 57 large hard plastic rings – similar to the plastic rings included in Kings of Middle-earth – to fit all the units and characters included in these three expansions. The rings fit around the figure bases; glue can be required for assembly.

The use of these rings in different colors helps players to differentiate at a glance the various factions each figure belongs to, without painting them. Packaged in a ziplock bag with hangtab, ready to use!
S_ORDER: WAR OF THE RING - COLORED PLASTIC RINGS – EXPANSIONS

Author: Ian Brody

Vendor: Ares Games
Release date:08/2024
Playing Age:13 and up
Number of players:1 - 6
Retail price:29.00 €
Playing time:60 minutes
Theme or setting:The Lord of the Rings

Fire and Swords is the new expansion for War of the Ring - The Card Game, introducing epic battles in northern Middle-earth and adding new factions to the game. It expands the strategies offered by War of the Ring - The Card Game with immersive gameplay, vast card variety, and integration of beloved themes from "The Lord of the Rings." Three new factions join the fray: the stout-hearted Northmen fighting for the Free Peoples, alongside the formidable Easterlings and cunning Ruffians allied with the Shadow. The expansion brings also new paths and battlegrounds for the "War in the North."

Fire and Swords allows to play an amazing 6-player experience, with adaptable scenarios tailored for smaller groups. It also includes all-new Shadow cards to play with the first expansion, Against the Shadow, for solo and cooperative gameplay.
S_ORDER: WAR OF THE RING THE CARD GAME - FIRE AND SWORDS
TITEL: War of the Ring The Card Game - Fire and Swords

Author: Ian Brody

Publisher: Ares Games

Playing Age:13 and up
Number of players:1 - 6

Theme or setting:The Lord of the Rings

War of the Ring The Card Game - Free Peoples Card Box and Sleeves (Radagast version) is the new addition to our new War of the Ring - The Card Game, and it features wonderful art created for the Free Peoples cards, including the Free Peoples logo by Francesco Mattioli and the iconic "Radagast The Brown" art by Kuo Yang, together with the cover illustration of the expansion Fire and Swords by John Howe.

The sturdy metal box also contains 60 clear card protector sleeves in 63x88 mm format for faction cards, and 30 clear card protector sleeves in 80x120 mm for battleground and path cards, and it is the perfect accessory to hold the all-new Free-Peoples cards contained in Fire and Swords, the second expansion set for War of the Ring - The Card Game.

Inside the box, you will also find a custom plastic tray designed to contain sleeved cards (in both formats) and tokens from the game.

For dedicated gamers who want to keep their cards in perfect shape, this accessory is the perfect solution to preserve them. Together with Free Peoples Card Box and Sleeves and Shadow Card Box and Sleeves, you will have all you need to store and protect all the game cards and tokens included in the game, in a compact and stylish way.
S_ORDER: WAR OF THE RING THE CARD GAME - FREE PEOPLES CARD BOX AND SLEEVES (RADAGAST VERSION)

Corvus Belli's Medieval Fantasy Wargame Warcrow is a miniatures wargame set in the fantastical world of Lindwurm. In this setting you control a small military force made up of warriors, creatures and wizards, who fight skirmishes pursuing the interests of your faction.

Open the box, discover, read, experiment and immerse yourself in the fantasy universe of Warcrow with Winds from the North.

Everything you need to start playing in one box: amazing miniatures, dice, cards, an exclusive game mat, an innovative turn counter, terrain elements, elves, dwarves, never-before-seen creatures, magic and much more...

A portal to the new medieval fantasy world of Corvus Belli.

Author: Games Workshop PLC
Publisher: Games Workshop PLC
Release date:07/2024
Playing Age:12 and up
Number of players:2
Retail price:170 €
Playing time:180 minutes
Theme or setting:Fantasy




Discover a world where heroes, gods, and monsters vie for supremacy across sprawling magical domains inhabited by countless species and peoples.

The Age of Sigmar is an era of unending war. For centuries, the mighty Stormcast Eternals have battled against the forces of evil. Yet now it seems the Hour of Ruin is nigh as the skittering, numberless hordes of the Skaven flood into the Mortal Realms. So potent is their arcane weaponry, that the God-king, Sigmar, has sent his most powerful champions to hold back the tide. At the head of this shimmering host march the Ruination chambers, warriors who have endured death so many times they are more akin to living weapons than the humans they protect.

Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Ultimate Starter Set is perfect for starting off with Warhammer Age of Sigmar – a thrilling fantasy setting you can participate in by collecting armies, painting them, and waging war with your friends. The 72-page handbook contains everything you need to get started with all aspects of this exciting hobby – you'll learn to build your models, discover the setting they belong to, and play thrilling, tabletop battles with them. Accompanying this is the Spearhead: Fire and Jade book, containing all the additional rules you need to play the fast-paced Spearhead game mode, along with a double-sided gaming mat on which to play out your Spearhead clashes.

Inside this boxed set you will find:

37x Push-fit, plastic miniatures:
– 1x Lord-Vigilant on Gryph-Stalker
– 1x Lord-Veritant with 1x Gryph-crow
– 3x Prosecutors
– 5x Stormcast Eternals Liberators
– 1x Clawlord on Gnaw-Beast
– 1x Grey Seer
– 1x Warlock Engineer
– 3x Rat Ogors
– 20x Skaven Clanrats

4x Push-fit, plastic terrain pieces
1x 72-page handbook
1x 144-page Spearhead: Fire and Jade book
1x Double-sided gaming mat, measuring 30" x 22.4" approx.
2x reference sheets
6x Six-sided 'D6' dice
36x Spearhead cards
1x 6" plastic range ruler
1x 3" plastic range ruler

This kit comes supplied with 1x Citadel 75mm Oval Hex Hole Base, 1x Citadel 90mm Oval Hex Hole Base, 3x Citadel 32mm Round Hex Hole Bases, 3x Citadel 50mm Round Hex Hole Bases, 9x Citadel 40mm Round Hex Hole Bases, and 20x Citadel 25mm Round Hex Hole Bases. These push-fit miniatures can be assembled without glue, and are supplied unpainted – we recommend using Citadel Colour paints.
S_ORDER: WARHAMMER AGE OF SIGMAR: ULTIMATE STARTER SET
TITEL: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Ultimate Starter Set

Theme or setting:Weaving

Hand-woven textiles are considered one-of-a-kind because of the unique mix of colours, embroidery and patterns that are so specific to the art of sewing.

In Warp & Weft, you will weave your own threads on your loom by passing them through the warp and weft. Each game has a different set of Shared Goal cards and Pattern cards, so each game will be different from the next. You will need to choose your threads wisely!

Warp & Weft is a family game for 2 to 5 players, recommended for ages 8 and up, and a game lasts 30 minutes.

Use your creativity to create the best woven pattern!

The future of miniature paint is here!

No matter whether you are a gamer looking to quickly get your miniatures to tabletop quality, a dedicated hobbyist refining your techniques, or a professional painter looking for a high-quality pigment range that offers excellent coverage and colour intensity.

The new Warpaints Fanatic features an insanely pigment-dense formulation set in a premium resin base with proprietary stabilizers to ensure smooth, effortless application. Our proprietary Stabilizing Technology enables these paints to be thinned to extreme levels while retaining pigment dispersion, making the paint easy enough for a beginner, fast enough for a gamer, yet capable enough for the best painters in the world!

The Mega Paint Set features 50 carefully selected paints at an INSANE price – making this the best value in hobby paints! Included in the box are

This combination of colours, paints, and Washes allow you to create highly realistic armour and weaponry, skin tones, and terrifying hordes of miniatures. Overall, with the Mega Paint Set it is easy for you to achieve fantastic and realistic results, taking your projects to the next level. 

The 18 ml no-spill dropper bottle comes pre-loaded with two high-grade stainless steel Mixing Balls, so you always have perfectly blended paint available.

Inside the Warpaints Fanatic Metallic Set, you will find 10 of the best-recommended metallics from the range.

The Metallics Set is a true must have for any discerning hobbyist! So, get ready to paint magical armour, wicked weaponry, or monstrous war machines – because painting true metallic metals has never been so simple.

Are you ready to take your models and miniature figures to the next level?

To wow your opponents with impressive details and realistic shading? Then look no further!

With the Warpaints Fanatic Wash Set you get 10 of The Army Painter’s unique Washes that create perfect shading effect and colour toning to your models and miniature figures every time. The acrylic, water-based formula contains extra-heavy pigment that flows over the raised areas and into the recesses, bringing out all the figure’s nuances and intense shading in no time.

Inside the Warpaints Fanatic Wash Set, you will find 10 Washes in tones that range from a rich Dark Tone to a vibrant Dark Red Tone, and many shades in between. Use the Fanatic Washes directly from the bottle and quickly create high contrast depth and shading for your miniatures. Simply Colour Prime and basecoat your miniature, apply a layer of Wash, and voila! A perfectly shaded miniature is ready for the game table.

Beyond the Horizon is a massive expansion for Waste Knights: Second Edition, a postapocalyptic game of adventure and survival. Now is the time to leave the continent, embark upon a ship and sail to places you only know from legends and myths.

Explore a new map enabling you to visit Tasmania, Solomon Islands or New Zealand altered by the Apocalypse. Learn the truth behind the infamous Project X, while battling deadly sea monsters and experiencing strange weather phenomena.
Seek for fresh water – a new resource that will make the game even more realistic and challenging both for sea-farers and continent dwellers.

Play as one of new Knights armed with unique abilities and expand your base game using tens of new cards, tokens, and adventures to experience a setting of enormous proportions however you like – solo, cooperatively or competitively.

Choose your ship, set the course and see where the winds shall take you!

Tired of constantly having to reapply paint to your dry palette during long painting sessions? Want to make your miniature paints last longer? Extend the lifetime of your paints by using The Army Painter Wet Palette.

A Wet Palette is a tool designed to keep your paint hydrated which makes them last longer during your marathon sessions at the hobby desk. The Wet Palette will also preserve your custom paint mixes preserving them far longer than a standard dry palette ever will.

This advanced tool is easy enough to use for a beginner and the perfect accessory for the experienced painter. Additionally, the Wet Palette helps to thin your paints for perfectly smooth layers of paint every time.

With 2 pieces of Hydro Foam and 50 Hydro Sheets included you'll have all of the materials needed to start using your wet palette.

This uniquely designed tool also features a clever inner layer that can hold up to 6 Wargamer Brushes and 10 Hobby Brushes from The Army Painter Range.

The Army Painter Wet Palette is a great value due to its high-quality materials and construction that is affordable priced compared to other palettes on the market. This Wet Palette is the go-to for budget hobbyists and professional painters alike!

Don't wait for paint to dry! Preserve your miniature paints with the Army Painter Wet Palette!

Each turn, players use cards to determine how far they can jump trying to reach the next rock without falling into the lava.

However, platforms collapse and move around, making the game increasingly challenging and unpredictable.

What the Fact?! is the adult trivia game we never knew we needed: packed with bizarre, outrageous, and even slightly morbid topics, along with curious facts, plenty of humor, and a hint of strategy.

Illustrator: Weberson Santiago
Publisher: Fractal Juegos
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:25 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Magic Forest

Whispering Woods is a magical place where Spiritual Animals live together in harmony. Each spirit animal seeks to protect the forest by following its paths and gathering the elements necessary to complete various missions. Hidden in the woods is a world of magic and mystery, but also of challenge and danger, as one misstep could lead to dire consequences.

Discover this game of strategy and planning, designed by Cristian Bustos and Bernardo Vasquez and illustrated by Weberson Santiago. Whispering Woods is a family game for 2 to 4 players, recommended for ages 8 and up, and a game lasts 30 minutes. It also includes a solitary variant where you have to plan very well to try to get through as many levels as possible.

Make your forest grow and carefully plan your path through it. Are you ready to explore the depths of the forest and discover its secrets? Listen carefully to its whispers as they will lead you to victory.

Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:7 and up
Number of players:2
Retail price:39 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:Animals and Nature

Wild Duo impresses with five unique two-player games. Each one stands out for its simplicity and cleverness, guaranteeing a unique gaming experience. The games are suitable for both children and adults, as the gaming experience strongly depends on the players’ skills. Therefore, some games can be decided in as little as 5 minutes, while others may last 30 minutes.

Authors: Madsen, Ulrik Morten
Illustrators: Sá de Freitas, Diego
Publisher: frechverlag GmbH
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 6
Retail price:34.99 €
Playing time:20 minutes
Theme or setting:Tier, Wasser, Wildwasser

Schnell den Fluss hinab – schaffst du es trockenen Fußes ins Ziel?

In der Savanne treten fünf Tierarten zu ihrem jährlichen Wettrennen an. Geparden gegen Geparden, Zebras gegen Zebras ... doch alle gleichzeitig und alle auf der gleichen Strecke!

Die Rennstrecke schlängelt sich durch die Landschaft und immer wieder gilt es, einen reißenden Fluss zu überqueren. Wer geschickt ist, kann sich dabei auf einem Baumstamm in Richtung Ziel tragen lassen – doch wer zuviel riskiert, rauscht schnell den Wasserfall hinunter und muss wieder von vorne anfangen. Der Fluss ist ständig in Bewegung und sorgt dadurch für Hochspannung.

Bringst du zuerst drei deiner Tiere ins Ziel und gewinnst so den großen Flusslauf?

Inhalt:

  • 1 Spielplan

  • 1 Platzierungsplan

  • 30 Flusstafeln

  • 36 Spielkarten

  • 31 Holzscheiben

  • 1 Würfel

  • 1 Anleitung

Spielprinzip: 

In jeder Runde bewegt man mit dem Ausspielen einer Handkarte eins seiner fünf Tiere auf der Rennstrecke voran. Kommt das Tier auf ein besetztes Feld, rückt es bis aufs nächste freie Feld vor. Tiere, die auf einem Baumstamm im Fluss landen, können die Fließbewegung des Wassers ausnutzen, um die Strecke abzukürzen. Wer allerdings nicht rechtzeitig abspringt, treibt den Wasserfall hinunter und muss neu starten. Für jede Tierart gibt es ein Siegertreppchen. Wenn jemand drei Tiere im Ziel hat, gewinnt, wer am meisten Siegpunkte erzielt hat.

2–6 Personen | Ab 8 Jahren | Spieldauer: 20–40 Minuten

Author: Hiroshi Kawamura
Illustrator: Yukiko
Publisher: Japon Brand
Vendor: JUGAME STUDIO
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:20 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Experts rate the vineyards and yield good investments

*EN rule newly added

In the game of Wine Rating, you are a wine critic. You give a rating to wines from various countries, while investing in wineries to monopolize the market.

This game uses 4 investment tokens per player and 16 cards. On the table, there is a space to hold 16 cards in 4 x 4 square grid, and each row and column represents reputation of a winery in which players may invest. Each turn, you have two options: you may place a rating card, which ranges from -3 to +5, in the square grid, affecting two wineries; or you may place two investment tokens on any wineries.

At the end of the round, the first majority investor on each winery takes the reputation score on that winery. After the third round, the highest scorer wins the game.

Although the cards have Japanese text, you can play Wine Rating ignoring the text. There are two types of cards: winery cards and rating cards. Winery cards are written in English and Japanese, and all Japanese text on the Rating cards are just flavor. They gorgeously describes a wine in wine critics' comments. Japanese players can enjoy the text, but it is not necessary for gameplay.

Author: Martin Schlegel
Publisher: Gerhards Spiel und Design
Vendor: Gerhards Spiel und Design
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:6 and up
Number of players:3 - 5
Retail price:40.00 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:A seesaw as a game board

Have you already seesawed today?

A wooden seesaw with colourful discs is the game board. With each move, one of your own discs is inserted or any disc is moved. The discs are then tilted, i.e. the board is turned to the other side. And everything looks different on the board. Due to the staggered grooves, it is not easy to predict how the discs will be arranged after tilting.

Because the aim is - three wins! The player who has at least 3 of their own discs next to or behind each other is the winner.

The base game is required.

Release date:02/2024

Number of players:2 - 5
Retail price:16 €

The Academy just got a little more demanding!

Take the next step in your career as an apprentice. The Academy offers 3 new modules that you can add to your game individually or in any combination. The teacher cards offer tasks, the magic grid cards reward optimal placement and the colorful companion cards allow a certain amount of flexibility in planning.

Author: Michal Peichl
Illustrator: Veronika Vondrová
Publisher: Albi
Release date:08/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:1 - 5
Retail price:20 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Potion brewing

Witchdom, designed by Michal Peichl and illustrated by Veronika Vondrová, is a smaller card driven game for 1 to 5 players of age 8 and older with playtime around half an hour. In this game you become the matriarchs of a witch clans and your aim will be to find promising new students that will learn recipes for potions, gather the necessary resources and in the end will be able to brew said potion and thus join your clan as full-fledged members. Witchdom is set to release in August 2024.

Authors: Wolfgang Kramer, Manfred Reindl
Illustrator: Kamila Mrożek-Zielińska
Publisher: Trefl SA
Release date:10/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 8
Retail price:19 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:magical, witches, fairy tales

Ready your magic cauldrons for an unusual challenge – one that requires exceptional skills! You study at a world-renowned Witch Academy, where you find yourselves in the Potions class! One wrong element, and the whole mixture might blow up spectacularly, leaving only clouds of smoke and costing you penalty points!

Features:

·       Simple yet exciting card game

·       Beautiful illustrations will transport you straight to the world of magic and divination

·       Fast-paced gameplay

How to play:

1. Lay out the potion cards on the game board.

2. Take turns playing magic ingredient cards from your hand, matching them by colour to the potion.

3. If you exceed the potion's value or add the wrong colour, the mixture explodes, leaving you with negative points at the end of the game!

Publisher: Deep Print Games
Vendor: Pegasus Spiele
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:4
Retail price:15 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:Crime Solving

In the reimplementation of Witness, exactly four people fight crime together as members of the secret "Witness Agency" organization! A prologue introduces the case, after which each team member receives their own secret clues. In the four Whisper rounds, these are passed on to another person - in the direction of the arrow on the Whisper card. In the first round, only their own clues are whispered, from the next round onwards, the clues that the players received in the previous round are also whispered. After the fourth round of whispering, the players secretly answer three questions about the case. Those who have listened carefully and answered the questions correctly receive valuable points when the case is solved.

On the Trail of the Chameleon contains an adventure with 8 individual cases woven into an overarching story: A groundbreaking invention in the fight against climate Change has caught the attention of spies and criminals worldwide, all intent on stealing its top-secret blueprints. Players' mission is to thwart their efforts, and follow the trail of the “Chameleon”, their everlasting foe …
S_ORDER: WITNESS - ON THE TRAIL OF THE CHAMELEON
TITEL: Witness - On the Trail of the Chameleon

In der überarbeiteten Neuauflage von Witness bekämpfen genau vier Personen als Mitglieder der Geheimorganisation „Witness Agency“ gemeinsam das Verbrechen! Ein Prolog führt in den Fall ein, danach erhält jedes Teammitglied eigene, geheime Indizien. In den vier Flüsterrunden werden diese – in Pfeilrichtung der Flüsterkarte – an eine andere Person weitergegeben. In der ersten Runde werden nur die eigenen Indizien weitergeflüstert, ab der nächsten Runde dann auch die, die die Spielenden in der vorherigen Runde erhalten haben. Nach der vierten Flüsterrunde beantworten die Spielenden geheim drei Fragen zum Fall. Wer gut zugehört hat und die Fragen richtig beantwortet hat, bekommt bei der Auflösung wertvolle Punkte.

Dem Chamäleon auf der Spur enthält ein Abenteuer mit 8 einzelnen Fällen mit durchgehender Story: Eine revolutionäre Erfindung im Kampf gegen den Klimawandel zieht auch das Interesse von Spionen und Verbrechern vieler Länder auf sich, die die streng geheimen Pläne dieser Erfindung stehlen wollen. Die Spielgruppe soll dies verhindern und muss dazu der Spur des „Chamäleons“ folgen, ihrem ewigen Widersacher…
S_ORDER: WITNESS - ON THE TRAIL OF THE CHAMELEON
TITEL: Witness - On the Trail of the Chameleon

Die Welt der Magie und Legenden öffnet sich mit dieser besonderen Ausgabe von Wizard, die zum 40. Jubiläum von "Das Schwarze Auge" in einem ganz besonderen Gewand erscheint.

Als wagemutige Zauberlehrlinge aus den tiefen Wäldern und hohen Türmen Aventuriens wetteifern Spielende darum, die zukünftigen Erfolge korrekt zu prophezeien. Mit jeder neuen Runde und zusätzlichen Karten wächst die Herausforderung, die Voraussagen zu meistern.

Die exklusive Sonderkarte, doppelseitige Metallmünzen sowie die Original-Illustrationen des Rollenspiel-Klassikers "Das Schwarze Auge" bieten ein besonderes Spielerlebnis.

Theme or setting:Steampunk, Luftschiff

Wolkenschiff - Volldampf voraus!

Als Crew navigieren die Spielenden das Wolkenschiff und lassen die Regentropfen in die richtigen Blumenbeete fallen. Doch ein Sturm zieht auf und an Bord sammelt sich Hagel, der den Blumen schadet. Mit ruhiger Hand wird das Wolkenschiff gesteuert, um nur die Regentropfen in die entsprechenden Blumenbeete fallen zu lassen. Durch gute Absprachen kann die Herausforderung gemeinsam geschafft werden, die Blumen blühen zu lassen.

Author: Susumu Kawasaki
Illustrator: Yoshiaki Tomioka
Publisher: itten
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 6
Retail price:19 €
Playing time:15 minutes
Theme or setting:Sports

A quirky bowling alley called Wonder Bowling has opened. Don't throw a ball - instead hit the lane itself with a special stick! Knock down some pins, but not too many - aim for specific numbers of pins to be left standing, or just one left for a strike. Set your sights on victory with a deft swing - not too strong, and not too weak! No bowling experience required in this surprising action dexterity game!

** The new international edition is estimated to be released end of 2024.

Authors: Tim Eisner, Ben Eisner, Ian Moss
Illustrator: Manny Trembley
Publisher: B-rex Entertainment
Vendor: B-rex Entertainment
Release date:06/2024
Playing Age:13 and up
Number of players:2 - 5
Retail price:90 €
Playing time:45 minutes
Theme or setting:Alice im Wunderland

Wo einst Witz und Heiterkeit an der Tagesordnung waren, herrscht jetzt nur noch Wut. Die Teeparty ist völlig zurechnungsfähig, die Herzkönigin spricht nur noch im Flüsterton, der Jabberwocky ist aus dem Gedicht entkommen und Alice kehrt zurück und findet das Wunderland als blassen Schatten seines früheren Selbst vor.
Jeder Anführer greift zu den Waffen, um das Wunderland, das er geliebt hat, wiederherzustellen. Einige kämpfen für ewige Teepartys, andere um des Kämpfens willen, wieder andere wollen alle Köpfe abschlagen und einer wünscht sich nichts sehnlicher als die Rückkehr zu dem vollkommen unlogischen Wunderland von früher.

Wähle also eine Seite und kämpfe in diesem asymmetrischen Spiel um die Zukunft von Wunderland.

In Wonderland's War schlüpfen 2-5 Spieler in die Rolle eines Fraktionsführers, der zur Teeparty des Hutmachers eingeladen wurde. Trinke Tee und iss Kuchen, während du dich um den Tisch bewegst und Karten ziehst, um deine Streitkräfte zu sammeln, Burgen zu bauen, deinen Anführer zu verbessern und Wunderländer für deine Sache zu rekrutieren - aber sei vorsichtig! Die Scherben des Spiegels sind im ganzen Wunderland verteilt. Wer zu viele Scherben sammelt wird am Ende zu verrückt.

Sobald alle Teller leer sind, ist die Tee-Party vorbei und der Krieg beginnt. Nutze die Kräfte, die du gesammelt hast, um deine Feinde an vertrauten Orten zu bekämpfen. Wer dabei zu viel Wahnsinn zieht verliert die Unterstützung seiner Truppen.

Kannst du genug Kraft aufbringen, um die Schlachten zu gewinnen?

Nachdem alle Schlachten geschlagen wurden, wird ein Waffenstillstand ausgerufen, und alle treffen sich wieder bei der Teeparty, um ihre Züge für den nächsten Kampf zu planen. Nach drei Runden wird die Fraktion mit den meisten Punkten zum neuen Anführer des Wunderlandes gekrönt!

Author: Thomas Dagenais-Lespérance
Publisher: Office Dog
Vendor: Asmodee Deutschland
Release date:04/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:2 - 5
Retail price:-
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Reise

In Word Traveler, you and your friends are tourists who are checking out the sights of a new city. Each player has their own secret map of locations that they want to visit, and they'll need help from the other players to reach them.Taking turns playing the traveler and the locals, you all work together to visit as many of these locations as possible, ideally collecting all of the golden souvenirs that you find. You know only a few words of the local language, however, so the locals — that is, the other players — will do their best to interpret your clues to help get you where you want to go...without getting lost in translation.

Author: Zé Mendes
Illustrator: Tom Ventre
Publisher: Arcane Wonders
Vendor: Arcane Wonders
Release date:06/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:1 - 5
Retail price:25.00 €
Playing time:50 minutes
Theme or setting:Ancient World

The greatest leaders from the ancient world are ready to pay all the gold they had to built the most glorious city of all times.

The MUNDO expansion for World Wonders offers up new Monuments (Stonehenge, Great Sphinx of Giza, Himeji Castle, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Gate of All Nations, Arch of Ctesiphon, Colossus of Rhodes, Olmec Colossal Heads, Terracotta Army) as well as the all new MUNDO game mode adding new ways to score with your Monuments!

Author: Zé Mendes
Illustrators: Odysseas Stamoglou, Tom Ventre
Publisher: B-rex Entertainment
Vendor: B-rex Entertainment
Release date:02/2024
Playing Age:12 and up
Number of players:1 - 5
Retail price:45 €
Playing time:50 minutes

Ihr seid Baumeister, die von den großen Herrschern der antiken Welt angeheuert wurden, um die prächtigste Stadt aller Zeiten zu errichten. Wählt dabei weise, welche Aufsehen erregenden Gebäude und wundersamen Monumente am besten zu eurer Stadt passen. Ihr seid Baumeister, die von den großen Herrschern der antiken Welt angeheuert wurden, um die prächtigste Stadt aller Zeiten zu errichten.

Wählt dabei weise, welche Aufsehen erregenden Gebäude und wundersamen Monumente am besten zu eurer Stadt passen. Jeder Spieler setzt sein Gold in jeder Runde ein, um Plättchen zu bauen, die die Wirtschaft seiner Stadt verbessern. Eine Stadt, die mehr Nahrungsmittel produziert und Handel treibt, bringt mehr Einwohner.

Lass deine Stadt zur Metropole heranwachsen! Es gibt 5 Gebäudetypen, und jedes liefert eine spezielle Ressource, mit der sich deine Stadt von einer einfachen Siedlung zur größten Stadt der Welt entwickeln kann. Wenn Gebäude von allen Seiten vollständig umschlossen sind, hast du einen sehr gut geplanten Stadtblock geschaffen. Das bringt dir eine Menge Punkte ein. Um neue Gebäude zu errichten, brauchst du ausreichend Straßen. Durch die Nähe von Straßen kannst du Gebäude in größerer Entfernung vom Spielplan platzieren. Dadurch erschließt du natürliche Ressourcen, die neben anderen Vorteilen auch Siegpunkte bringen. Genauso wichtig wie die Gebäude sind Monumente und Wundermarken. Diese bringen viele Siegpunkte, verbrauchen aber dein gesamtes Gold. Wähle den richtigen Zeitpunkt und den richtigen Platz, um möglichst viele Siegpunkte zu generieren.

Jedes Monument erfordert Gebäude, Straßen, natürliche Ressourcen oder sogar Wasser in seiner Nähe, um platziert zu werden. Es wird nicht einfach sein, sie in deiner Stadt unterzubringen, aber die Vorteile werden groß sein. Wenn dein Gold aufgebraucht ist, ist auch dein Zug zu Ende. Sobald alle Spieler ihr Gold ausgegeben haben, beginnt eine neue Runde und neue Gebäude und Straßen stehen allen zur Verfügung. Sobald ein Spieler die maximale Bevölkerungszahl erreicht hat, wird der Anführer der besten Stadt der antiken Welt zum Gewinner von Wunder der Welt!

Author: Zé Mendes
Illustrator: Tom Ventre
Publisher: B-rex Entertainment
Vendor: B-rex Entertainment
Release date:12/2024
Playing Age:14 and up
Number of players:1 - 5
Retail price:20 €
Playing time:50 minutes

Eure Städte sind noch nicht prunkvoll genug! Die Architekten haben weitere Monumente ersonnen, die das Ansehen eurer Städte vergrößern werden.

Nehmt die Herausforderung an, auch diese in eure Stadtplanung zu integrieren und die beeindruckendste Stadt der Antike zu errichten!

Wunder der Welt - MUNDO Wunderpaket ergänzt das Grundspiel Wunder der Welt um weitere 9 Monumente mit besonderen MUNDO-Bauplänen. Ihr könnt die neuen Monumente wie gewohnt dem Spiel hinzufügen oder im MUNDO-Modus spielen, der euch zusätzliche Ziele und Ansehen einbringt.

Author: Joel and Rafael Escalante
Illustrator: Ewelina Proczko
Publisher: Steffen Spiele - Helvetiq
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2
Retail price:24.90 €
Playing time:20 minutes
Theme or setting:Abstract

Xok is easy to learn yet offers tactical depth. The objective is to connect your fish and sharks in a group of 10. But beware of the opponent's sharks, as they can eat fish and have the power to dismantle all your tactical plans. Stay vigilant and strategize wisely with your shark to secure victory.

1. Take turns placing fish or sharks to expand your territory.

2. Use your sharks to eat the opponent's fish and thus reduce their territory.

3. The first player to group together 10 of their fish and sharks wins the game.

Authors: A. Bonfanti, T.R. Ceglia, R. Corti
Illustrator: Studio Cornelius
Publisher: Dawn Town Games
Vendor: Dawn Town Games
Release date:06/2024
Playing Age:10 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:40 €
Playing time:30 minutes
Theme or setting:Japanese Street Food

Players will be busy running a Japanese street food stall. Thanks to a 3x2 grid system, it will be possible to choose which types of action to carry out in one's turn between adding customers, cooking food, stocking the fridge with drinks, serving dishes, and recycling empty bottles. All with a queue management mechanism that will require you to coordinate your choices well to best satisfy customers. During the game, developing your own Yatai, adding cooking plates, enlarging the refrigerator, or learning to cook new dishes and improving customer reviews will be possible.

Author: Baptiste Vaiana
Illustrator: Julien Bigot
Publisher: Helvetiq
Release date:09/2024
Playing Age:8 and up
Number of players:2 - 4
Retail price:28 €
Playing time:20 minutes
Theme or setting:MAYA

Build the 8th world wonder ! Yaxha dives deep into Mayas pyramids construction of the actual Guatemala. Get the stone blocks to build your own pyramid. Every round, batches of 3 stone blocks are available. Choose the ones that bring some money back home through the various colors. Assemble your blocks wisely to build the most beautiful Maya pyramid and win the game. Of course, your opponents will try to take them away from you. Yaxha is a game with simple rules, but that requiers strategy and a good sense of timing !

Author: Masato Uesugi
Illustrator: Takashi Konno
Publisher: Play to Z
